profile:
Okotoks Vacuums is a leading vacuum store serving Okotoks, Southern Calgary, High River, and the foothills area. 
Stocking Central Vacuums & Portable Vacuums. Sales, installation and repair. 
Our customer service and knowledgeable staff, combined with our quality vacuums and expert repair service have helped to build a reputation that we are proud to stand behind.
We carry many major vacuum brands, specializing in those that are designed to perform for years to come such as SEBO, Nilfisk, Miele, Dyson and more.

KEEP YOUR VACUUM RUNNING LIKE NEW
Okotoks Vacuums carries an extensive selection of bags, belts, filters, and accessories for all BRANDS of vacuums. 
Our experienced technicians repair ALL BRANDS of vacuums from central vacuums, portable vacuums to air purifiers.

PUT OUR YEARS OF EXPERIENCE TO WORK FOR YOU
Our expert staff and unmatched selection, paired with quality, value and convenience, make us your one-stop shop. 
Okotoks Vacuums provides the knowledge and experience to help you find the best solution for your floor cleaning needs.

BREATHE EASIER
Okotoks Vacuums is committed to your air quality. 
We carry the very best the vacuum cleaner industry has to offer in active HEPA filtration, effectively and efficiently cleaning your air as you vacuum. 
Good news for allergy and asthma sufferers and for all of us.

Stop in today for an in-store demonstration of any vacuum from our large selection. 
Try it out yourself in our hands-on showroom. 
FREE estimates for service, convenient parking available. 
You can trust Okotoks Vacuums for all your vacuum needs.

(403) 982-0026
